item.title: Contact From 7 如何在表单中添加 referer-page 信息？
item.description: 平时我们使用contact from 7可以得到一封非常完善的询盘信息。 如何了解访客是通过哪一个页面进入我们的发送询盘的页面的呢？ 这里就需要我们来操作一下达到我们的的需求了。 添加代码到function.php 将

item.title: About
item.description: Information about me I am a website-build amateur and foreign trade salesman. This site is a blog that records my personal thoughts and exciting things I want to share. My Motto: Throw me to the wolves, and I will return leading them. Support Thanks for all of my friend’s support that why I build this blog to record my personal thoughts and exciting things I want to share. I don’t wild wishes much help to everyone, it can solve current problems encountered at least. Hope to encourage each other on the way forward. ☺︎ Contact me Email: 1@oneuie.me
